entries.headline: Norwegian slopestyle snowboarder Torstein Horgmo, a Sochi 2014 medal favourite, in hospital after training crash
Leeds boss Brian McDermott will report as normal at the club's training ground on Monday despite appearing to be sacked on Friday
British Olympic gold medallist Zac Purchase announces his retirement from professional rowing
The Seattle Seahawks thrash the Denver Broncos 43-8 in Super Bowl XLVIII to win their first NFL title
